integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.heading: Direct Integration With Directories
integrations.subtitle: Link your Business Profiles with Multiple Directories, CRMs & more

q1.question: Can NNH AI Studio help me create & verify my Business Location?
q1.answer: Yes! NNH AI Studio provides comprehensive assistance for creating, verifying, and managing your Google Business Profile locations. Our platform guides you through the entire process and helps you secure your listings.

q2.question: Which Directories are synced with NNH AI Studio?
q2.answer: NNH AI Studio integrates with major directories including Google My Business, YouTube, Bing, Apple Maps, ChatGPT, Instagram, Facebook, and many more. We continuously add new integrations to ensure maximum visibility.

q3.question: How can NNH AI Studio help my Business Rank better on Local Search?
q3.answer: NNH AI Studio helps improve your local search rankings through AI-powered content optimization, review management, keyword tracking, profile enhancement, and real-time analytics. Our platform provides personalized tasks and recommendations to boost your visibility.

q4.question: Does NNH AI Studio help with Reviews & Reputation Management?
q4.answer: Absolutely! NNH AI Studio offers AI-powered review response generation, sentiment analysis, review monitoring, and automated reply suggestions. Manage all your reviews and maintain a positive online reputation from one dashboard.

q5.question: Do you have solutions for Brands & Agencies with Multiple Locations?
q5.answer: Yes! NNH AI Studio offers specialized solutions for agencies and multi-location brands, including white-label dashboards, bulk verification assistance, team collaboration tools, advanced analytics, and custom pricing plans tailored to your needs.

Approvals.title: Approvals & Location Management
Approvals.subtitle: Create new Google Business locations and manage verification process

step1.title: Basic Information
step1.subtitle: Enter your business details as they should appear on Google
step1.businessNamePlaceholder: The DXB Night Club - Downtown Branch
step1.businessNameTip: Use your official business name as registered
step1.streetAddressTip: Make sure this address can receive postal mail
step1.infoText: Make sure your address can receive postal mail. Google will send a verification postcard with a code to this address. The verification process typically takes 5-14 business days.

step2.title: Category & Hours
step2.subtitle: Help customers find your business with the right category
step2.primaryCategoryTip: Choose the category that best describes your business
step2.hoursTip: For businesses open past midnight, use times after 24:00 (e.g., 26:00 for 2 AM)

step3.title: Features & Amenities
step3.subtitle: Tell customers what makes your business special
step3.featuresTip: Select all features that apply to your business
step3.paymentMethodsTip: Let customers know which payment methods you accept
step3.infoText: Adding features and amenities helps customers find your business when searching for specific services. For example, 'Night clubs with parking' or 'Bars with Wi-Fi'.

step4.title: Review Your Location
step4.subtitle: Please review all details before submitting to Google
warningItems: Make sure all information is accurate and up-to-date
Google will send a verification postcard to the address provided
You'll be notified when the postcard arrives

pending.title: Locations Awaiting Verification
pending.subtitle: Enter the verification code when you receive it from Google

empty.title: No Pending Verifications
empty.message: Create a new location to start the verification process

pending.helpText: Haven't received your code? It can take up to {{time}} to arrive.
infoItems: Postcard: Check your mailbox daily. The code expires after 30 days.
Phone: Answer the call and note down the 6-digit code.
Email: Check your inbox and spam folder.
If you don't receive the code within the expected time, you can request a new verification.

verified.title: Successfully Verified Locations
verified.subtitle: These locations are now live on Google Business Profile

empty.title: No Verified Locations Yet
empty.message: Complete the verification process to see your locations here

verified.congratsText: Your verified locations are now live on Google Maps and Search. Customers can find you, see your business hours, leave reviews, and get directions. Monitor your performance in the Analytics section.

issues.title: Locations With Issues
issues.subtitle: These locations need your attention to complete verification

empty.title: No Issues Found
empty.message: All your locations are proceeding smoothly

reasons: Phone number is invalid or unreachable
Location already claimed by another user
actions: Verify your address matches official records (government registration, utility bills)
Ensure business name is exactly as registered
Check if the location is already claimed on Google Maps
Contact Google Business Profile support for manual review
issues.helpText: If you're having trouble resolving these issues, our support team can help you through the process.

postcard.name: Postcard
postcard.description: Google will mail a postcard with a 5-digit code to your business address

phone.name: Phone Call
phone.description: Get an automated phone call with a verification code

instant.name: Instant Verification
instant.description: Verify instantly if you have access to existing listing
